@@ -530,0 +530,10 @@
+    /**
+     * Tests if MenuItem has properties.
+     * @return true if node has properties.
+     *
+     * @since 22
+     */
+     public boolean hasProperties() {
+        return properties != null && !properties.isEmpty();
+    }
